underspecified sentence: "Control information on all controlled variables must be provided by all subsystems on request. No request for information shall produce a delay of control activities or locking, even if the corresponding equipment is not available or faulty."
control sentence: Subsystems must provide requested information about controlled variables without causing delays or locking in control activities, even if the corresponding equipment is unavailable or faulty.

underspecified sentence: "Delay times for the exchange of control information must stay within precise time limits to be defined in “General Description” in Chapter 2. One can afford to retransmit commands in case of transmission error or collision, but the protocol has to be predictable in that commands cannot get lost and replies have to come back reliably."
control sentence: The exchange of control information must adhere to the time limits specified in Chapter 2 of the General Description, and the protocol must be predictable, ensuring that commands are not lost and replies are returned reliably, allowing for the retransmission of commands in case of transmission error or collision.

underspecified sentence: "In a number of cases, synchronization with the Time Reference System at the Gemini 8m Telescopes site is also necessary."
control sentence: Synchronization with the Time Reference System at the Gemini 8m Telescopes site is required in certain instances.

underspecified sentence: "Access to control parameters, telescope and instrument information for monitoring or other use makes a significant contribution to the control flow, and may be logged at quite high rates for short periods (i.e. up to 200 Hz for some information)."
control sentence: The control flow requires access to parameters, telescope, and instrument information for monitoring or other purposes. This information may be logged at high rates, up to 200 Hz, for brief periods.

underspecified sentence: "It is explicitly required that all such information is available to the Gemini 8m Telescopes software and is capable of being available to all users of the Gemini 8m Telescopes, subject only to restrictions with respect to updating. It must also be possible to restrict user access to such information."
control sentence: The Gemini 8m Telescopes software must provide access to all relevant information to all users, with the exception of updates, and it must also support the restriction of user access to this information.

underspecified sentence: "In particular also, the meteorological information coming from a weather station should be available centrally."
control sentence: The weather station's meteorological data must be accessible centrally.

underspecified sentence: "Detector data must be acquired and stored in the most effective way technology will allow; effectiveness should be evaluated in terms of cost, space requirements, longevity, and speed. This shall lead to the definition of a Gemini 8m Telescopes standard, used on all instruments. In general, operational overheads must be kept as low as possible, to maximize actual observing times."
control sentence: The system must efficiently acquire and store detector data, with evaluation based on cost, space requirements, longevity, and speed. This efficiency standard should be applied to all Gemini 8m Telescopes instruments. The system should minimize operational overheads to maximize observing time.

underspecified sentence: "Intermediate storage of raw data in memory on different nodes and in different formats should be kept to a minimum. However, there must be at least two copies - one to secure data as acquired and one to do assessment of data quality on-line (this last copy preferably on removable media)."
control sentence: Maintain minimal intermediate storage of raw data in memory across multiple nodes and in various formats. Ensure at least two copies of the data: one for secure data storage as it is acquired, and another for real-time data quality assessment, with the latter preferably stored on removable media.

underspecified sentence: "The link chosen to transfer data should represent as small a bottleneck as possible for data acquisition."
control sentence: The data transfer link should minimize data acquisition bottlenecks.

underspecified sentence: "Normally, raw data will be acquired and stored as such for quick look evaluations. There might, however, be cases (for example, infrared detectors) where fast preprocessing is needed and where, therefore, raw data will not be stored as such, but in a preprocessed format."
control sentence: Raw data should be stored for quick evaluation, but in cases where fast preprocessing is required (such as with infrared detectors), the data should be stored in a preprocessed format.

underspecified sentence: "Astronomical data will have to be transported between GEMINI and the home institutes of visiting astronomers in FITS format (as defined by NOST 100-1.0, “Definition of the Flexible Image Transport System (FITS)”, NASA Science Office of Standards and Technology)."
control sentence: The astronomical data must be transmitted from GEMINI to the home institutes of visiting astronomers in the FITS format, as specified by NASA Science Office of Standards and Technology's NOST 100-1.0 document, Definition of the Flexible Image Transport System (FITS).

underspecified sentence: "TV data concerning site monitoring and voice need to be capable of being available at all operations facilities. It will be a question of interfacing and bandwidth costs whether such information is actually available at a specific location. It is not a requirement that point to point video be available between Gemini 8m Telescopes operations facilities. It is a requirement that voice connectivity, perhaps point to point, be available on a permanent connection."
control sentence: Voice connectivity, potentially point-to-point, must be available on a permanent connection at all operations facilities for TV data related to site monitoring. Point-to-point video connectivity between Gemini 8m Telescopes operations facilities is not required.

underspecified sentence: "Other astronomical information such as that coming from sky field monitors, autoguider cameras and sky monitoring devices such as cloud and seeing monitors shall also be capable of being available."
control sentence: The software must be capable of integrating and displaying data from sky field monitors, autoguider cameras, cloud monitors, and seeing monitors.

underspecified sentence: "Operation of telescope, instruments and subsystems can be carried out at three different levels. There will be parameters associated with each level of operation which define the status of the system and / or control the system. The specific access by different types of users to particular parameters of the different levels are given in Section 2.5.8 on page 25."
control sentence: The telescope, instruments, and subsystems can be operated at three distinct levels. Each level of operation has associated parameters that define the system's status or control the system. Access to specific parameters at each level is detailed in Section 2.5.8 on page 25 for various user types.

underspecified sentence: "This is the normal operational mode. It allows a certain number of embedded tests, normally at a fairly high level. Monitoring is also done at this level."
control sentence: The system operates in normal mode, supporting a specified number of embedded tests at a high level, and performing monitoring at the same level.

underspecified sentence: "It is anticipated that all user categories have access to this level."
control sentence: All user categories must have access to this level.

underspecified sentence: "This allows maintenance tables (for example, with instrument parameters) to be updated."
control sentence: The software should enable the updating of maintenance tables, such as those containing instrument parameters.

underspecified sentence: "It is anticipated that the majority of parameters at this level will be accessed by operations and development staff."
control sentence: The parameters at this level are expected to be primarily accessed by operations and development staff.

underspecified sentence: "This allows the installation and testing of new packages or new releases. Any low level test can be performed in this mode."
control sentence: The system enables the installation and testing of new packages or new versions, and it supports the execution of low-level tests.

underspecified sentence: "It shall be possible to update all non-protected parameter values, i.e. those not used by operations at observing level."
control sentence: The software must allow for the updating of all non-protected parameters that are not used in observing-level operations.

underspecified sentence: "Access to this level will be extremely limited."
control sentence: Only a few users will have access to this level.

underspecified sentence: "A further subdivision within the levels can be achieved by implementing privileges associated with categories of users or with the location of the user station (local or remote). For example some users might only be allowed monitoring, as a subsystem is in use by someone else."
control sentence: Users should be assigned privileges based on their category or location, with some users only allowed to monitor a subsystem when it is not in use by another user.

underspecified sentence: "Protections must also be enforced (see also Security in Section 3.5.6 on page 3- 20) among users and the operational software should indicate clearly to users the current operation level and check the compatibility between subsystems in different modes."
control sentence: The software must enforce security protections as detailed in Section 3.5.6 on page 3-20. Users should be informed of the current operation level, and the software must verify the compatibility between subsystems in different modes.

underspecified sentence: "There must be automatic procedures to implement startup and shutdown of the telescope and instruments. These must allow startup and shutdown of instruments independently of the telescope and without affecting the telescope operation."
control sentence: The system shall include automated procedures for initiating and terminating the telescope and its instruments. These procedures should enable independent startup and shutdown of the instruments without interfering with the telescope's operation.

underspecified sentence: "Reconfiguration procedures must exist, to change the observing environment."
control sentence: The software must include reconfiguration procedures for modifying the observing environment.

underspecified sentence: "The definition of the observing environments must be dynamic, i.e. feasible during operations without the need to restart everything. The same applies to the related light path."
control sentence: The observing environments and related light paths must be dynamically configurable, allowing for adjustments during operations without requiring a system restart.

underspecified sentence: "Operations staff have privileges to change the environment, meaning selecting a suitable combination of instruments."
control sentence: Operations staff are granted the ability to select appropriate configurations of tools within the environment.

underspecified sentence: "The operational software should know which subsystems are installed and operational at any given time."
control sentence: The software must be able to determine the status of each installed subsystem, whether it is operational or not, at any given time.

underspecified sentence: "The standard software must be adequate for the real-time requirements and must offer drivers to the standard electronics to be used on all the Gemini 8m Telescopes software subsystems and instruments."
control sentence: The software must meet real-time requirements and provide drivers for standard electronics compatible with all Gemini 8m Telescope software subsystems and instruments.

underspecified sentence: "Links between electronics interfaces and main processors must meet the requirements imposed by the data specifications (see Section 3.1 on page 3- 1)."
control sentence: The links between electronics interfaces and main processors must adhere to the data specifications outlined in Section 3.1 on page 3-1.

underspecified sentence: "The output format of the Gemini 8m Telescopes data must be compatible with the GEMINI archive requirements."
control sentence: The Gemini 8m Telescopes' output format must adhere to the GEMINI archive specifications.

underspecified sentence: "As comparisons with previous data might be of great value and affect the actual observing program, on-line interactive access to the data archiving system should exist, so that access to this database is possible for Gemini 8m Telescopes users."
control sentence: Gemini 8m Telescopes users must have online, interactive access to the data archiving system for the purpose of comparing data with previous records, which may impact the observing program.

underspecified sentence: "The Gemini 8m Telescopes software must be able to interface with all commercial software packages available on the Gemini 8m Telescopes and integrated into the Gemini 8m Telescopes operation."
control sentence: The Gemini 8m Telescopes software must be compatible with all commercially available software packages used in the operation of the Gemini 8m Telescopes.

underspecified sentence: "A relevant example of such a package is a general database management system (DBMS), where operational information such as schedules, logs, problem reports and maintenance information related to various pieces of equipment should be kept."
control sentence: The software package in question should be a general database management system (DBMS) that stores operational information, including schedules, logs, problem reports, and maintenance information for various pieces of equipment.

underspecified sentence: "The Gemini 8m Telescopes software shall be able to bring the Gemini 8m Telescopes system quickly to a safe state upon detection of danger. Safety aspects shall be analyzed during the functional specification phase of the software."
control sentence: The Gemini 8m Telescopes software must rapidly transition the Gemini 8m Telescopes system to a secure state upon identifying a hazardous condition, with safety considerations addressed during the functional specification stage of the software development process.

underspecified sentence: "A system that is operating in Engineering/Maintenance mode must ignore directives from other systems, though status information should still be provided for use by other systems."
control sentence: In Engineering/Maintenance mode, the system should disregard commands from other systems, but it should continue to provide status updates for use by other systems.

underspecified sentence: "There should be security preventing the intrusion into the system by unauthorized users, or users at unauthorized access levels."
control sentence: The system must implement access control to prevent unauthorized users and users at unauthorized access levels from gaining entry.

underspecified sentence: "All systems are appropriately interlocked. This interlock must not depend on any software for reliable operation. Details of the interlock system are found in the Mount Control System Work Package Definition."
control sentence: The interlock system in all systems must operate reliably without relying on any software, as specified in the Mount Control System Work Package Definition.

underspecified sentence: "As much as possible, the system is to take advantage of parallel operation to improve efficiency. The Telescope Control System should be capable of detecting and invoking parallel operation as it is responsible for control of all of the telescope and enclosure subsystems."
control sentence: The Telescope Control System must be designed to leverage parallel operation for efficiency improvements, and it should be capable of autonomously detecting and initiating parallel operations, as it manages all telescope and enclosure subsystems.

underspecified sentence: "Test procedure methods have to be defined in the Software Test Plan (STP), while test plans shall be written for all individual software packages and modules comprising the Gemini 8m Telescopes software."
control sentence: The Software Test Plan (STP) must include the definition of test procedure methods. Test plans must be written for each individual software package and module within the Gemini 8m Telescopes software.

underspecified sentence: "Apart from the component and integration test procedures, a formal release system should exist at package and module level, which should be checkable on-line by the operational procedures for consistency. Every system must thus be able to supply its current version upon request."
control sentence: A formal release system, checkable online, must exist at both package and module levels. This system should be capable of providing the current version of each system upon request.

underspecified sentence: "All software is to be developed using typical modularization and standardization techniques. In particular, each module's environment is strictly defined by its interface to other components. No module can rely upon information outside of this interface. Module selection should be done in logical fashion to minimize the size of the interfaces between modules."
control sentence: Modules in the software must be developed using standard modularization techniques, with each module's environment defined by its interface with other components. No module should rely on information outside of its interface, and module selection should be logical to minimize the size of the interfaces between modules.

underspecified sentence: "The on-line databases can be considered part of this interface, but are only accessible reliability and availability."
control sentence: The online databases are part of the interface and are accessible only with reliability and availability.

underspecified sentence: "A measure of fault rates should be done during commissioning to establish baseline rates for system reliability monitoring."
control sentence: During commissioning, establish baseline fault rates for system reliability monitoring.

underspecified sentence: "There are to be recovery procedures to restart after error failure. See section Section 3.2.5 on page 3 - 5."
control sentence: The software must include recovery procedures for restarting after an error failure. These procedures are detailed in Section 3.2.5 on pages 3-5.

underspecified sentence: "During science planning, there should be validity and feasibility checks to help ensure effective and efficient use of the telescope. Where appropriate, these checks should also be performed during operation."
control sentence: The science planning process must include validity and feasibility checks to ensure efficient and effective telescope usage. These checks should also be implemented during telescope operation when necessary.

underspecified sentence: "The system should be constantly monitoring active subsystems to be sure they are operating correctly before sending commands to each subsystem. This monitoring should continue on inactive subsystems."
control sentence: The system should continuously monitor both active and inactive subsystems to ensure their proper operation before issuing commands to each subsystem.

underspecified sentence: "All telescope and instrument parameters are kept in an on line database to permit easy implementation of table-driven applications. The interface between software control packages is normally done via interface calls to the on-line database."
control sentence: The online database stores all telescope and instrument parameters for easy implementation of table-driven applications. The software control packages interact with each other primarily through interface calls to this online database.

underspecified sentence: "A fundamental criteria of Gemini telescope operation is that it support a full implementation of remote operations. This includes remote observing, remote control of telescope, enclosure, and instruments, multipoint monitoring, remote monitoring, remote access for testing, development, diagnostics, and maintenance."
control sentence: The Gemini telescope must fully support remote operations, encompassing remote observing, control of the telescope, enclosure, and instruments, multipoint monitoring, remote monitoring, remote access for testing, development, diagnostics, and maintenance.

underspecified sentence: "It is expected that all operational capability found in on site operations is extended to remote operations, with some degradation in performance resulting from WAN bandwidth considerations. This means the video data signals must be encoded digitally and transferred via the WAN to remote sites."
control sentence: The system must digitally encode video data signals and transmit them over the WAN to enable remote operations, with a potential decrease in performance due to WAN bandwidth limitations.

underspecified sentence: "There must be some form of security to control access to system features, possibly restricting some operations to specific remote sites (e.g. Hale Pohaku or Hilo in Hawaii, Cerro Tololo in Chile, etc.)"
control sentence: The system must implement a security mechanism to regulate access to its features, with the ability to restrict certain operations to specific remote locations such as Hale Pohaku, Hilo in Hawaii, Cerro Tololo in Chile, and so on.

underspecified sentence: "Input data are all data that are predefined at operation start. This includes catalogs, calibrations and flat fields available in archives, etc."
control sentence: The input data consist of all predefined data that are available at the start of an operation, such as catalogs, calibrations, and flat fields stored in archives.

underspecified sentence: "Observing commands (whether entered interactively or via the Sequencer) are input data that provide information on the course of operation and trigger events."
control sentence: Commands, whether entered interactively or through the Sequencer, serve as input data that specify the operation's progress and initiate events.

underspecified sentence: "One criteria is that sufficient information be recorded during an observation to recreate the sequence of events that occurred during the observation. This requires that all input and output data be logged appropriately."
control sentence: During an observation, all input and output data must be logged accurately to allow for the recreation of the sequence of events that occurred.

underspecified sentence: "Given an initial set of configuration parameters, the Gemini system operates via a sequence of commands. This operation is complemented by using previously stored mdata, calibrations, and star catalogs."
control sentence: The Gemini system, provided with an initial set of configuration parameters, performs its operation through a series of commands, utilizing previously saved mdata, calibrations, and star catalogs.

underspecified sentence: "Wherever possible, Gemini software is to take advantage of existing software. However, all existing software is to be evaluated in terms of the specifications given here. This helps reduce life-cycle costs and maintenance efforts."
control sentence: Gemini software should utilize existing software whenever feasible. All existing software must be assessed based on the provided specifications to minimize life-cycle costs and maintenance requirements.
